attributes.action: Elect Jeremy Corbyn as PM. LIFE BEFORE BUSINESS
attributes.additional_details: It will prevent less deaths, better outcomes for many and relieve stress in the day that we live in
attributes.background: I would like our country to stand by our voice that has been seen as Jeremy Corbyn, who has the health of our people t heart and not the financial properties influencing his discussions.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honors or appointments, which includes calling for someone to be made Prime Minister.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
